# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints

# Virtual environments
.env/
.venv/
env/
venv/

# Streamlit cache and logs
.streamlit/
logs/
cache/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# VS Code settings
.vscode/

# Kaggle or large datasets
*.csv
ratings_Electronics.csv

# Python egg files
*.egg
*.egg-info/

# Test output
htmlcov/
coverage.xml
*.cover

# PyInstaller
dist/
build/
*.spec

# pipenv
Pipfile.lock

# mypy
.mypy_cache/
.dmypy.json
.pyre/
